name: leed
description: Leed is a lightweight RSS feed aggregator that can be self-hosted, offering a minimal web interface to subscribe, read, and categorize feeds. It stores articles locally and supports plug-ins for additional functionality.
features: RSS Aggregation: Subscribe to feeds, Article storage, Category organization. Centralize your news reading.
Lightweight: Minimal interface, Fast performance, Low resource usage. Simple and efficient RSS reader.
Plugin Support: Extend functionality, Custom features, Community add-ons. Customize your reading experience.
Article Management: Mark as read, Favorites, Archive. Organize your reading list.
Category Organization: Feed folders, Tag system, Custom groups. Structure your content sources.
Offline Reading: Local storage, Cached articles, No internet needed. Read anywhere.
Search Functionality: Full-text search, Filter articles, Quick find. Locate content easily.
Import/Export: OPML support, Backup feeds, Migration tools. Portable feed management.
